name: Halloween Dozer - Haunted Coin Machine Game for Kids (Best Boys & Girls Game)
name_original: Halloween Dozer - Haunted Coin Machine Game for Kids (Best Boys & Girls Game)
description:
Evil Jack ‘O Lantern must be fed coins or mayhem ensues! Use your spooky dozer to shovel all kinds of goodies into his insatiable pie-hole and reap your foul rewards! Sinful Skulls! Cadaverous Candy! And Goulish Gold can all be yours if you’ve got the guts to take on Halloween Dozer. Beware! Drop too many coins and prizes are pushed off the edge of oblivion!

Very Addicting!

Features:
Hardcore coin-dropping strategy
Multi-coin and Scary bonuses
Casual game play

Unlock more coins!
developers: Sizzle Entertainment: The Best Fun Free Cool Apps and Top Addicting Games
